description: This module provides an XQuery API to perform set operations on sequences.

functions.name: value-except
functions.signature: ($seq1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $seq2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType* external
functions.description:
Filters the first sequence of atomic items such that they are not in the
 second sequence based on their values.
functions.summary: Filters the first sequence of atomic items such that they are not in the second sequence based on their values.

returns.description: a sequence only containing items from $seq1 that are not in $seq2.

functions.name: value-intersect
functions.signature: ($seq1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $seq2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType* external
functions.description:
Performs a set intersection of two sequences of atomic items based on their
 values.
functions.summary: Performs a set intersection of two sequences of atomic items based on their values.

returns.description: a sequence containing only items from $seq1 that are also in $seq2.

functions.name: value-union
functions.signature: ($seq1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $seq2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType* external
functions.description: Performs a set union of two sequences of atomic items based on their values.
functions.summary: Performs a set union of two sequences of atomic items based on their values.

returns.description: a sequence containing all items from $seq1 and seq2$ but without duplicates.
